dashboard.overview: Your wealth ecosystem at a glance.
dashboard.rev_finances: Ready to compound your community capital?
dashboard.activity_desc: Real-time tracking of your financial movements.
dashboard.no_activity_desc: Start by joining a group or making a contribution.
dashboard.make_contribution_desc: Record your monthly contribution to any of your groups
dashboard.apply_loan_desc: Request a loan from any of your active groups
dashboard.manage_groups_desc: View and manage your village banking circles
dashboard.active_groups_desc: Active circles you're a member of
dashboard.pending_desc: There are {count} contributions waiting for your review.
dashboard.insights_desc: We are currently enhancing our AI-driven insights to help you maximize your group's growth. Check back soon for personalized recommendations.
dashboard.ensure_details: Ensure your account details are up to date.
dashboard.start_participating: Start participating in a village circle.
dashboard.optimal_state: Your activities are in optimal state.
dashboard.join_group_error_desc: You need to be a member of a group to make contributions.

groups.track_growth: Track contributions, loans, and financial growth.
groups.create_group_desc: Start a new savings circle and empower your community today.
groups.no_groups_desc: You haven't joined any village banking circles yet.
groups.admin_only_desc: Only administrators are authorized to modify circle parameters and settings.
groups.delete_warning_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the circle and all associated data.
groups.delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the circle and remove all data from our servers.

vault.title: Vault
vault.no_records_desc: No contributions or loans found matching your criteria.

contributions.title: Contributions
contributions.subtitle: Manage your monthly contributions
contributions.reminder_desc: You haven't made your contribution for {month}.
contributions.no_contributions_desc: Start contributing to your village banking circles.

loans.title: Loans
loans.subtitle: Manage your loan applications and repayments
loans.eligibility_desc: Check your eligibility for loans in each circle
loans.no_loans_desc: Apply for your first loan once you have 3 months of contributions.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: View your personal information and activity

landing.subtitle: The premium operating system for modern investment circles. Secure, transparent, and built for exponential growth.
landing.circle_mgt_desc: Automated governance for your investment circles. Streamline record-keeping, compliance, and member tracking.
landing.liquidity_desc: Instant access to leverage based on your proven contribution history. Zero friction, maximum opportunity.
landing.staking_desc: Real-time visibility into your portfolio performance. Watch your collective capital compound monthly.
landing.trust_desc: Built on a foundation of transparency and security, uBank ensures your community's funds are safe and always accessible.
landing.security_desc: Top-tier encryption protects every transaction and personal data point.
landing.realtime_desc: The blockchain-inspired ledger ensures no transaction is ever lost or altered.
landing.elite_interface_desc: A beautiful, intuitive interface designed for the modern saver.
landing.cta_title: Ready to modernize your Village Bank?
landing.cta_desc: Join the financial revolution. Bring your community circle into the digital age today.

security_page.title: Uncompromising Security
security_page.subtitle: Your trust is our most valuable asset. We employ state-of-the-art technology to protect your community's wealth.
security_page.encryption_desc: All data, from personal details to financial transactions, is encrypted at rest and in transit using industry-standard protocols.
security_page.privacy_desc: We purely process your data. We do not sell or share your personal financial information with third-party advertisers.
security_page.infra_desc: Hosted on secure, redundant cloud servers ensuring 99.9% uptime and data durability against failures.
security_page.cta_desc: Focus on growing your wealth, we'll handle the safety.

ecosystem_page.title: The uBank Ecosystem
ecosystem_page.subtitle: A holistic financial platform designed to uplift communities through shared prosperity.
ecosystem_page.concept_desc: We've taken the traditional 'Bank Nkhonde' model and supercharged it with digital tools, removing geographical barriers and administrative friction.
ecosystem_page.network_desc: As more groups join, the ecosystem grows stronger, unlocking future potential for inter-group lending and larger capital projects.
ecosystem_page.growth_desc: Tools designed not just for saving, but for investing. Transform idle cash into active capital for your members.

features_page.title: Powerful Features
features_page.subtitle: Tools built for Treasurers, Secretaries, and Members alike.
features_page.admin_tools_desc: Manage loans, approve contributions, and set fine rules with complete control.
features_page.member_app_desc: Check balances, request loans, and view history from a beautiful mobile dashboard.
features_page.analytics_desc: Visual charts and reports to understand your group's financial health at a glance.
features_page.notifications_desc: Never miss a payment with automated SMS and Push reminders.

pricing_page.title: Simple, Fair Pricing
pricing_page.subtitle: We only grow when you grow. Transparent costs for powerful tools.
pricing_page.free_tier_desc: Always free for individual members to join and participate.
pricing_page.premium_tier_desc: A small platform fee on interest generated, ensuring we are aligned with your success.

about_page.title: Our Story
about_page.subtitle: Born in Malawi, Built for Africa.
about_page.mission_desc: To digitize and empower the informal financial sector, giving every community group the tools of a modern bank.
about_page.vision_desc: A future where financial inclusion is not just a buzzword, but a reality for every household in Malawi.
about_page.team_desc: A dedicated team of Malawian developers and financial experts passionate about technology and social impact.

auth.register_banner_desc: Create your identity and begin managing your village bank with confidence.
auth.banner_desc: Join thousands of Malawians building wealth through community savings.

register.register_desc: Register to start saving and borrowing in your group.

forgot.title: Restore Access
forgot.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a secure recovery link.
forgot.success_desc: If an account exists for {email}, you will receive a link shortly.
forgot.error_user_not_found: No account found with this email.

reset.title: Secure New Password
reset.subtitle: Create a strong password for your village bank profile.
reset.success_desc: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now login.
reset.error_invalid_token: This recovery link is invalid or has expired.

help.title: How Village Bank Works
help.subtitle: Detailed guides and lessons for every role in your community bank.
help.need_help_desc: Our support team is always ready to help you with any issues not covered in these guides.

member_section.dashboard_desc: The central hub for all your banking activities. Tracking your savings and loans has never been easier.

dashboard_steps.overview_desc: View your Total Savings, Outstanding Loans, and Recent Activity at a glance.
dashboard_steps.navigation_desc: Use the sidebar (or bottom menu on mobile) to switch between Circles, Contributions, and Loans.
dashboard_steps.notifications_desc: Check the bell icon for important updates like loan approvals or contribution reminders.

member_section.joining_desc: Village banking is about community. Here is how you connect with others.

joining_steps.join_desc: Get a joining link from an existing member or admin. Click it to request access.
joining_steps.create_desc: Go to the Circles page, click 'Create New Circle', and set the rules (contribution amount, interest rates).
joining_steps.details_desc: Click on any circle card to see its members, total capital, and your specific history within it.

member_section.contributions_desc: Regular savings build your financial future. We support multiple ways to save.

contributions_steps.select_desc: Navigate to the Contributions page and pick the circle you want to contribute to.
contributions_steps.method_desc: You can pay via Mobile Money (Airtel/TNM) or pay Cash physically to your Treasurer.
contributions_steps.verify_desc: For online payments, you'll get instant confirmation. For cash, your Treasurer must record it manually.

member_section.loans_desc: Access capital when you need it most, based on your savings history.

loans_steps.check_desc: Use the eligibility checker on the Loans page to see your maximum borrowing limit.
loans_steps.apply_desc: Click 'Apply for Loan', enter the amount, and choose a repayment period.
loans_steps.wait_desc: Admins/Treasurers will review your request. Once approved, funds are disbursed.

treasurer_section.responsibilities_desc: As a treasurer, you are the guardian of the group's manufacturing capital. Your accuracy ensures trust within the group. You have special access to record cash transactions that members hand to you physically.
treasurer_section.recording_desc: When a member hands you physical cash, you must record it immediately to update their balance.

recording_steps.open_desc: Go to the Circle page and look for the 'Record Cash' button (visible only to Treasurers).
recording_steps.select_member_desc: Search for the member who gave you the money.
recording_steps.enter_details_desc: Input the Amount, the Month/Year this payment covers, and a short description.
recording_steps.confirm_desc: Submit the form. The member will instantly see this reflected in their dashboard.

treasurer_section.verifying_desc: Ensure the physical cash in the box matches the system records.

verifying_steps.check_desc: Compare the 'Total Cash' figure in the app with the actual cash on hand.
verifying_steps.log_desc: Review the 'History' tab to see all recorded transactions and spot any errors.
verifying_steps.discrepancies_desc: If figures don't match, check if a recent cash handout was not recorded or double-counted.

admin_section.responsibilities_desc: As a Circle Admin, you are the leader of your savings circle. You set the rules, approve members, and oversee the lending process to ensure the circle's success.
admin_section.member_mgt_desc: Build a trusted circle by carefully managing who joins your circle.

member_mgt_steps.review_desc: When someone uses your invite link, you must approve them before they can join.
member_mgt_steps.manage_desc: View member details and remove anyone who violates circle rules.
member_mgt_steps.roles_desc: Promote trusted members to Treasurer or Secretary to help manage the workload.

admin_section.loan_oversight_desc: Protect the circle's capital by vetting loan applications.

loan_oversight_steps.review_desc: Check loan requests for amount, purpose, and the member's repayment capacity.
loan_oversight_steps.approve_desc: Make the final decision. Approved loans are automatically queued for disbursement.
loan_oversight_steps.monitor_desc: Track active loans and follow up on any missed payments.

settings_page.title: Profile Settings
settings_page.subtitle: Manage your personal identity details.
settings_page.updates_sync_desc: Updates here will sync across all your community groups immediately.
settings_page.security_desc: Manage your login methods and security keys.

verification_form.title: Identity Verification
verification_form.subtitle: Upload your official documents to verify your identity and unlock verified status.
verification_form.submitted_desc: Our team will review your documents shortly. You will receive a notification once verified.
verification_form.front_sub: Clear photo of the front side
verification_form.back_sub: Clear photo of the back side
verification_form.selfie_sub: Hold your ID next to your face
verification_form.secure_note: Your documents are encrypted and stored securely. They are only visible to authorized administrators for verification purposes.

footer.desc: Empowering communities with secure, transparent, and digital financial tools.
